original_text:
Money Train 2
La Relax Gaming ha da poco rilasciato Money Train 2, seguito della fortunata slot che vede un gruppo di banditi impegnati a svaligiare un treno pieno di soldi. Anche in questo nuovo capitolo avremo a che fare con dei personaggi poco raccomandabili, tra dinamite, pistoleri veloci come il vento e cecchini infallibili. Il punto di partenza per proporre una slot all’altezza della precedente è stato utilizzare la stessa grafica ricercata che esaltai ancor di più il tema della storia e da questo punto di vista la Relax Gaming ha fatto un ottimo lavoro. Appena apriamo il gioco, appare all’orizzonte un paese fantasma che si staglia su un paesaggio desertico oscurato subito dopo dal passaggio di un treno merci che casualmente si ferma proprio davanti a noi. Quando il portello del vagone si apre, compare la griglia di gioco e i tasti sulla destra: quello Start, quello per impostare al meglio la nostra scommessa e le doppie frecce che attivano i giri veloci, oltre naturalmente al tasto Autoplay. La musica ha un tono epico tipico dei film western più famosi.
Caratteristiche di Money Train 2
Anche per questo nuovo appuntamento la Relax Gaming ha deciso di puntare su una slot con 5 rulli e 4 righe, con 40 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata parte da un minimo di 0,10 € a un massimo di 1.000 € e un RTP è pari al 96%, con una volatilità media.
Simboli e funzionalità
Punto di forza di Money Train 2 è il sistema di bonus, acquistabili anche attraverso il tasto “Buy Feature” che appare sulla destra. Vediamo prima i simboli, quelli più bassi sono i 4 semi delle carte da gioco, mentre di valore superiore troviamo i 4 banditi: Payer, Sniper, Collector e Necromancer, la mente della banda. Il teschio di ferro è il nostro simbolo Wild, sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quello Bonus, ossia il simbolo della ruota. Due in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli rivelano dei moltiplicatori. Non c’è un numero fisso di giri gratis, qua andranno avanti sino alla prima vincita, inoltre ad ogni giro perdente il moltiplicatore aumenta di 1. Con 3 o più simboli Bonus parte invece la funzione Money Cart. Avremo 3 giri gratuiti e una funzione speciale associata a ogni personaggio:
• Payer: svela un moltiplicatore della scommessa e lo assegna a tutti i simboli sulla schermata
• Collector: Oltre a svelare un moltiplicatore, colleziona tutti gli altri valori apparsi sullo schermo.
• Collector/Payer: nel caso appaiano entrambi i personaggi, avremo entrambe le funzioni viste in precedenza.
• Sniper: Svela un moltiplicatore e raddoppia il valore dei simboli bonus
• Necromancer: Svela un moltiplicatore e riattiva tra 2 e 7 simboli speciali visti poco sopra.
Reset Plus: il simbolo dell’orologio svela un moltiplicatore e assegna un ulteriore giro gratuito.

Domande Frequenti 
Com’è il suo RTP?

Ottimo, è pari al 96,4% con una volatilità media.



Qual è il range di scommessa di Money Train 2?

Le scommessa partono da un minimo di 0,10€ a un massimo di 1.000€.



Quali sono le caratteristiche della slot?

Il provider Relax Gaming che l’ha sviluppata ha previsto una slot affascinante di 5x4 con 40 linee di pagamento fisse.

raw_translation.response:
Money Train 2, the latest release from Relax Gaming, is a follow-up to the popular slot game featuring a group of bandits attempting to rob a train full of money. We are once again presented with unsavory characters, including dynamite experts, sharpshooting snipers, and pistol-wielding rogues. To match the high standards of its predecessor, Relax Gaming has done an exceptional job of using the same refined graphics that amplify the game's theme. Upon opening the game, players are met with a deserted town on a dark, desert background, with a train casually stopping in front of them. The game grid and controls appear when the freight car's door opens, including the Start button, the option to adjust the bet, and the double arrows to activate fast spins. Naturally, the Autoplay button is also present. The music has an epic tone reminiscent of the most iconic western films.

Money Train 2 features a 5-reel and 4-row slot game with 40 fixed paylines, a minimum bet of 0,10 €, a maximum bet of 1.000 €, an RTP of 96%, and medium volatility.

The game's strength lies in its bonus system, which can be purchased via the "Buy Feature" button on the right side of the screen. Let's take a look at the symbols: The lower values are the four playing card suits, while the higher values include the four bandits: Payer, Sniper, Collector, and Necromancer (the mind behind the bandit group). Our wild symbol is the iron skull, which substitutes for all other symbols except for the bonus symbol, the wheel. Two wheel symbols in any position reveal multipliers. There isn't a fixed number of free spins; they continue until the first win, and every losing spin will increase the multiplier by 1. With at least three bonus symbols, the Money Cart feature starts. This feature includes three free spins and a special function associated with each character:

• Payer reveals a bet multiplier and assigns it to all symbols on the screen.
• Collector reveals a multiplier and collects all other values displayed on the screen.
• Collector/Payer: If both characters appear, we'll have both previously mentioned functions.
• Sniper reveals a multiplier and doubles the value of bonus symbols.
• Necromancer reveals a multiplier and reactivates between 2 and 7 special symbols seen above.
• Reset Plus: The clock symbol reveals a multiplier and assigns another free spin.

What is the RTP rate for Money Train 2?

The RTP is excellent, at 96.4%, with medium volatility.

What is the betting range for Money Train 2?

The betting ranges from a minimum of 0.10€ to a maximum of 1,000€.

What are the features of the slot?

Relax Gaming, the developer who created this fascinating slot, has provided a 5x4 game with 40 fixed paylines.

Relax Gaming has recently released Money Train 2, the sequel to the successful slot game that features a group of bandits attempting to rob a train full of money. This new chapter once again features unsavory characters, including dynamite, gun-slinging bandits, and expert snipers. To create a slot game worthy of its predecessor, Relax Gaming utilized the same refined graphics that enhance the story's theme. They have done an excellent job in this regard. When the game opens, a ghost town appears on the horizon, set against a darkened desert landscape, soon to be illuminated by the passing of a cargo train that happens to stop right in front of us. When the wagon door opens, the game board appears, along with the buttons on the right-hand side: Start, a button to place our bet, and double arrows that activate fast spins, as well as the Autoplay button. The music has an epic tone typical of the most famous western films.


Features of Money Train 2

Once again, Relax Gaming has chosen a slot with 5 reels and 4 rows, with 40 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is 0.10 € and the maximum bet is 1,000 € with an RTP of 96%, with medium volatility.


Symbols and Features

Money Train 2's strength lies in its bonus system, which can be purchased via the "Buy Feature" button on the right. Let's take a look at the symbols first. The 4 low-value symbols are the four suits of playing cards. The higher-value symbols include the 4 bandits: Payer, Sniper, Collector, and the mastermind behind the gang, Necromancer. The iron skull is our Wild symbol, and it substitutes for all symbols except the Bonus symbol, which is the wheel symbol. Two Bonus symbols in any position on the reels reveal multiplier values. There is no fixed number of free spins; they continue until the first win, and after each losing spin, the multiplier increases by 1. With 3 or more Bonus symbols, the Money Cart feature is activated. We will have 3 free spins and a special function associated with each character:


• Payer: Reveals a multiplier of the bet and applies it to all symbols on the screen
• Collector: In addition to revealing a multiplier, the Collector collects all other values shown on the screen.
• Collector/Payer: If both characters appear, both of the previously mentioned functions will be activated.
• Sniper: Reveals a multiplier and doubles the value of the Bonus symbols
• Necromancer: Reveals a multiplier and reactivates between 2 and 7 special symbols seen earlier.
Reset Plus: The clock symbol reveals a multiplier and awards an additional free spin.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Money Train 2".

Please provide an FAQ:

Review: Money Train 2

Relax Gaming has recently released Money Train 2, the sequel to the successful slot game that features a group of bandits attempting to rob a train full of money. This new chapter once again features unsavory characters, including dynamite, gun-slinging bandits, and expert snipers. To create a slot game worthy of its predecessor, Relax Gaming utilized the same refined graphics that enhance the story's theme. They have done an excellent job in this regard. When the game opens, a ghost town appears on the horizon, set against a darkened desert landscape, soon to be illuminated by the passing of a cargo train that happens to stop right in front of us. When the wagon door opens, the game board appears, along with the buttons on the right-hand side: Start, a button to place our bet, and double arrows that activate fast spins, as well as the Autoplay button. The music has an epic tone typical of the most famous western films.


Features of Money Train 2

Once again, Relax Gaming has chosen a slot with 5 reels and 4 rows, with 40 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is 0.10 € and the maximum bet is 1,000 € with an RTP of 96%, with medium volatility.


Symbols and Features

Money Train 2's strength lies in its bonus system, which can be purchased via the "Buy Feature" button on the right. Let's take a look at the symbols first. The 4 low-value symbols are the four suits of playing cards. The higher-value symbols include the 4 bandits: Payer, Sniper, Collector, and the mastermind behind the gang, Necromancer. The iron skull is our Wild symbol, and it substitutes for all symbols except the Bonus symbol, which is the wheel symbol. Two Bonus symbols in any position on the reels reveal multiplier values. There is no fixed number of free spins; they continue until the first win, and after each losing spin, the multiplier increases by 1. With 3 or more Bonus symbols, the Money Cart feature is activated. We will have 3 free spins and a special function associated with each character:


• Payer: Reveals a multiplier of the bet and applies it to all symbols on the screen
• Collector: In addition to revealing a multiplier, the Collector collects all other values shown on the screen.
• Collector/Payer: If both characters appear, both of the previously mentioned functions will be activated.
• Sniper: Reveals a multiplier and doubles the value of the Bonus symbols
• Necromancer: Reveals a multiplier and reactivates between 2 and 7 special symbols seen earlier.
Reset Plus: The clock symbol reveals a multiplier and awards an additional free spin.


FAQs:

What is the RTP of Money Train 2?

Great news! The RTP of the game is 96.4% with medium volatility.

What is the betting range of Money Train 2?

The betting range starts from a minimum of 0.10 € and goes up to a maximum of 1,000 €.

What are the features of the slot?

The provider Relax Gaming has developed a fascinating slot with 5x4 reels and 40 fixed paylines.
